【考法 1】 n. 混乱 a condition or place of great disorder or confusion.
【例】 the boy's room is in such chaos that it looks as though a tornado had struck 小男孩的房间如此得混乱以至于看起来像台风来袭
【近】 disarrangement, dishevelment, disorder, disarray, havoc['hævək], mess, muddle['mʌd(ə)l], jumble, welter
【反】 order 有秩序
【派】 chaotic adj. 混乱的，无序的：happening in a state of complete disorder and confusion
【反】 strictly structured, strictly featured 构造严谨的，特征严谨的
【记】 音：吵死
